content.raw:
@Stefan_Kohlbrecher and @rhololkeolke I have confirmed the slow loading of practice task 2 and created [gazebo issue 877](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/877/gzclient-slow-to-load-with-many-models-due) to track it. In my testing, gzserver appeared to load relatively within 20 seconds or so, but gzclient could take about 2 minutes.

If you don't need gzclient, load gzserver instead of gazebo:
~~~
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo drc_practice_task_2.launch gzname:=gzserver
~~~
